sentences.sContent: Michael Jorden surnamed “Flying Trapezist” has stepped out of the NBA.
sentences.sCn: “空中飞人”迈克尔乔丹已从NBA中退役了。

sentences.sContent: With all of the new faces, this time may be as important to the Rockets as any other team in the NBA.
sentences.sCn: 有了所有的这些新面孔，这个时候无论对火箭还是NBA其他球队都是一样的重要。

trans.tranCn: 全美篮球协会(National Basketball Association)，国家篮球协会 （美国职业篮球联赛）
trans.tranOther: the American organization which arranges professional basketball games
